testcase.name: comma delimited param value (normal)
testcase.system-out: Given url demoBaseUrl.......................................................passed And path 'echo'.............................................................passed And param fieldList = 'name,id,date_created,date_modified,created_id,modified_id'.passed When method get.............................................................passed Then status 200.............................................................passed And match response.fieldList[0] == 'name,id,date_created,date_modified,created_id,modified_id'.passed

testcase.name: comma delimited param value (in url)
testcase.system-out: Given url demoBaseUrl + '?fieldList=name,id,date_created,date_modified,created_id,modified_id'.passed And path 'echo'.............................................................passed When method get.............................................................passed Then status 200.............................................................passed And match response.fieldList[0] == 'name,id,date_created,date_modified,created_id,modified_id'.passed
